newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Santos settles gas field litigation.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Santos settles gas field litigation.

text.p: Oil and gas producer Santos Ltd said on Monday the producers in the South Australian Cooper Basin Unit have executed an agreement which settles the current review and adjustment arbitration and litigation.

The producers have also agreed upon fixed factors to apply in the entirety of production exploration licences (PELs) five and six, including the South Australian Cooper Basin Unit area, other than the Patchawarra East Block.
The result is a positive outcome for each of the Cooper Basin parties and brings arrangements in South Australia in line with the Queensland Cooper Basin, Santos said.
There is not anticipated to be any impact on Santos' profit and loss accounts as a result of this settlement, Santos said.
The settlement will remove the cost of legal proceeding in respect of reviews and adjustments, together with achieving operational cost savings, it said.
Santos owns 59.75 percent of the Cooper Basin unit, Exxon Corp's owns 20.21 percent, Boral Ltd 13.19 percent, Crusader Resources NL, a unit of Clyde Petroleum Plc and Basin Oil NL 2.10 percent.
